ARABIC: قَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا مَن قَدَّمَ لَنَا هَٰذَا فَزِدْهُ عَذَابًا ضِعْفًا فِى ٱلنَّارِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will say, 'Our Lord, give him who brought this on us double the punishment in the Fire!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They will say: "O Lord, give him who has brought this upon us two times more the torment of Hell;"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They will say: “Our Lord, give twofold punishment in the Fire to him who has led us to this.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will continue saying, "Lord, double the torment of fire for those who led us into this.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They say, “Our Lord! Whoever has brought this calamity upon us – double the punishment of the fire for him!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They will say: "Our Lord! Whoever brought this upon us, add to him a double torment in the Fire!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They shall say: Our Lord! whoever prepared it first for us, add Thou to him a double chastisement in the fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They say, 'Our Lord, whoso forwarded this for us, give him a double chastisement in the Fire!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They say: Our Lord! Whoever did prepare this for us, oh, give him double portion of the Fire!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: adding, "Our Lord, give double punishment to those who brought this upon us."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They Will say: our Lord! whosever hath brought this upon us, - Unto him increase doubly the torment of the Fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They will say, ‘Our Lord! Whoever has prepared this for us, double his punishment in the Fire!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They will say: "Our Lord! whoever brought this upon us,- Add to him a double Penalty in the Fire!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They will say: "Our Lord! Whoever brought this upon us, add to him a double torment in the Fire!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They will say: 'Our Lord, give those who brought this upon us double the punishment of the Fire'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They will say, “Our Lord, whoever brought this upon us, give him double torment in the Fire.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They will say, "Our Lord, whoever brought this upon us - increase for him double punishment in the Fire."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:61] They, also, say, ‘Our Lord, whoever prepared this for us, give him double his chastisement, that is, [give him in addition] the like of his chastisement, for his disbelief, in the Fire!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They say) the first to enter the Fire and the last say: (Our Lord!) our Lord! (Whoever did prepare) whoever prescribed (this) religion; meaning here Satan and all the leaders of error (for us), oh, give him double portion of the Fire) double than what we have!
